title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, create, delete models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as a local LLM for chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-chat
summary: Lightweight Node CLI chat interface for Ollama with conversation history.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Node CLI that wraps Ollama REST endpoints for quick model pulls and prompts.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for chatting and managing Ollama models with native JSON streaming.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN service tasks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images for running Ollama server in containers.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama (Windows/Mac/Linux).

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats via Ollama with slash commands and context.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local Ollama models into channels or DMs.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that streams Ollama responses with session state.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Unofficial Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio and async streams.
